column4: Sky Sports Racing Sky 415 Fillies' Novice Stakes (GBB Race)
column19: Preference is for SHUMUS, who has a striking pedigree and made a promising start with her eyecatching third at Windsor in July.
column20: 6/4 Shumus, 3/1 Regal Charm, 7/2 Jindri, 4/1 Aphrodite Spirit, 14/1 Alta Rica
column36: Won at Newmarket on return; this is tougher under penalty but she's open to more progress
column37: Finished in rear at a massive price on Newmarket debut (7f, good to soft) last October but she reappeared with a 2-1 win in six-runner race there (1m, good to firm) last month; this is tougher under a penalty but she's well-related and is open to more progress on this step up to 1m2f.

column4: Sky Sports Racing Sky 415 Fillies' Novice Stakes (GBB Race)

column36: Well-held fourth on Windsor debut and she's probably one for further down the line
column37: Study Of Man half-sister to four winners; attracted support into 14-1 at Windsor (1m2f, good to firm) last month but she was never dangerous in a well-held fourth of nine; has plenty to find on this switch to AW and she's probably one for further down the line.

column4: Sky Sports Racing Sky 415 Fillies' Novice Stakes (GBB Race)

column36: Just about sets the standard on her second at Chepstow and she's respected upped in trip
column37: Ulysses filly who made a promising start when third of nine at Goodwood in June and she built on that when a rallying second at Chepstow (1m, good) the following month; just about sets the standard on that form and she's respected upped in trip.

column4: Sky Sports Racing Sky 415 Fillies' Novice Stakes (GBB Race)

column37: Made a low-key start at Kempton (7f, AW) in December but she left that form a long way behind when third behind a clearcut winner at Chelmsford (1m2f, AW) last month; has claims if she can build on that and she's in the mix with Oisin Murphy booked.

column4: Sky Sports Racing Sky 415 Fillies' Novice Stakes (GBB Race)

column37: Sea The Stars filly out of a useful half-sister to Group 1 winner Tamayuz (1m); had some traffic issues when 25-1 at Windsor (1m2f, soft) in July but she made some eyecatching late headway to finish third of 14; that was a promising start and she's a key player on that form.
